title: Botched Ariz. Execution Renews Unease Over Lethal Injections
teaser: Activists against the death penalty are seizing on a botched execution in Arizona Wednesday. Witnesses say that death row inmate Joseph Rudolph Wood gasped for air, taking nearly two hours to die by lethal injection.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
